title: Dev Blog: Building a Better Bio

replies.body: I want the ninja story to develop more....zed,akalishen etc
I have a feeling this is going to be just as great as the Bilgewater update{{summoner:31}}

shivers went up my spine when i read the first of the harrowing stories and Lucian was in it!!!!! OMG so cooool!!! gj rito. cant wait for the diana lore too!! KEEP IT UP GUYS!! FOUNDATIONS TEAM IS BOMB :)

Well you guys did kind of wipe the memories of every 'Shurima' champion and gave them new ones... In 3 or less sentences. They need to be given way more exciting lore. {{champion:33}} {{champion:72}} {{champion:32}} {{champion:69}} {{champion:15}}

I've got an idea for an event, the 2 major military forces Noxus and Damacia should have an all out war, with support from the other smaller regions providing support, change the rift for the event to be faction themed one side Damacia/piltover the other side Noxus/Zaun, give sertain champs skins themed to the alliances during the event, i guess kinda like the crimson elite skins, through the event it would be a good way to flesh out the garen/katarina story as well as swain and Darius.
More detailed bios! Greater lore! I think Christmas, sorry Snowdown, just came early for me!

i think you really need to Ionia, the champs in Ionia have been existing in league ever since S2 speaking as a s2 veteran, yi and shen were one of the first released into the game and irelia and kennen were also pretty early, there are quite a few champions related in ionia to do but i'm pretty sure it'll be worth the effort cos {{champion:85}} is love <3
I would really love to know more story about Rammus {{champion:33}} and Jax {{champion:24}}  cuz I dont think they have proper story an its kinda mysterious so yeah

I'm surprised they're going into Shurima again, it wasn't so long ago that we had the big {{champion:268}} event and lore rewrites for those champs. Not that I'm complaining; #Ilovelore

But personally, I'd be more interested to see something from the Void or maybe touch base with Ionia, Piltover or Zaun before going back to Shurima...
could you guys please redo {{champion:32}} ??? he's one of my favs

Awwwwweeesome! The backstories have always held huge appeal for me; glad to hear they're all be brought up to a high standard. :) Judging from the amount of work involved, though, should I avoid getting my hopes up on the return of the JoJ?
